Finally receiving a reply, Belthassan felt somehow deceived by the 
threat.

Belthassan: We will act accordingly, but please refrain from such 
threats.
(To strika): Strika, land on an island near the Autobot base. They 
seem to have defences up.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Hoist worked diligently at the computer in the Hidden One, when the
> muffle of the Tripredacus radio frequency. "What? What was that?" 
Hoist
> asked very confused. He began to tap his fingers on the keyboard, as 
he
> knelt over and  began to weld circuitry together. The message began 
to
> come in clearer. "Great." He then opened a com-link to the 
Tripredacus.
> 
> "This is Hoist, Maintenance for the Autobots. Tell your troop to 
meet us
> halfway, or Autobots will shoot first." He warned thinking of the
> Dinobots.
